methods.name: getRef
methods.docblock:
Get reference to the dropdown item (either DropdownItem or CheckboxItem)
@returns {Object} Dropdown Item reference
methods.description: Get reference to the dropdown item (either DropdownItem or CheckboxItem)

disabled.description: Boolean for whether dropdown item is disabled

active.description: Boolean for whether dropdown item is active

href.description: Url for dropdown item when clicked

isSelected.description: Boolean for whether dropdown item is selected
